Related Character(s): 耨
Связанный символ (и): 耨

鎒字的基本解释

鎒
nòu
同“耨”。

鎒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［nòu］
［《廣韻》奴豆切，去候，泥。］
亦作“鐞1”。同“耨1”。
短柄锄形农具。多用于锄草。
[②]［hāo］
［《集韻》呼高切，平，曉。］
亦作“鐞2”。
除草，薅草。

鎒字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鎒； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1316第23
【五音集韻】奴豆切，同耨。【詩·周頌·庤乃錢鎛傳】鎛，鎒也。【疏】鎒，或作耨。字詁云：頭長六寸，柄長一尺。鎒，古字也。今作耨。　又【玉篇】呼高切，音蒿。除草。【戰國策】操銚鎒，與農人居壠畝之中。【註】鎒，呼高反。【淮南子·說山訓】治國者，若鎒田去害苗者而已。

考證：〔【詩·周頌·痔乃錢鎛傳】〕　謹照原文痔改庤。
鎒字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鎒字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Xi
nòu
Same as "耨".
Xi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［nòu］
["Guangyun" Slut beans are cut, waited, and muddled. ]
Also known as "Dai 1". Same as "耨1".
Short-handled hoe-shaped farm tool. Mostly used for weeding.
[②]［hāo］
["Ji Yun" Call Gaoqie, Ping , Xiao. ]
Also known as "Dai 2".
Weeding, scalloped grass.
Xi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　鎒; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1316 Page 23
【Pentagram rhyme】Cut the slave beans, the same as the genius. 【Poetry·Zhou Song·The Biography of Qian Piao】Pian, Ye Ye. 【Sparse】Yi, or behave. Words go: The head is six inches long and the handle is one foot long. Hey, the ancient characters are also. Jin Zuo Xun.　[Jade Chapter] Hu Gaoqie, Sound Artemisia. weeding. 【Warring States Policy】Cao Xiu, living with farmers in the middle of acres. [Note] Hey, speak up against it. [Huainanzi·Shushan Xun] The ruler of the country is only the one who harmed the seedlings. Textual research: [[Poetry·Zhou Song·Hemorrhoids Naiqian Piao Biography]] 　 I would like to change the original hemorrhoids.
